articles.title: Donald Trump: PM Modi says make and spend in India as 50% tariffs kick in - BBC
articles.description: The US president's steep 50% tariffs on India have kicked in, sending Narendra Modi's government into firefighting mode.
articles.content:
Modi has urged small shop owners and businesses to put up "Made in India" boards outside their stores
Donald Trump's steep 50% tariffs on India have kicked in, weeks after the US president issued an… [+6296 chars]
